title: A$AP Rocky Says 'Helicopter' Video Was Not Made Using AI
description: A$AP Rocky is pushing back against speculation that his latest music video relies on artificial intelligence.
content:
A$AP Rocky has denied that his upcoming “Helicopter$” music video was created using artificial intelligence.
On Monday (Jan. 12), the rapper released the visual for “Helicopter$,” his first music video of 2026. Shortly after the video dropped, online... [1823 chars]

title: AI helps fuel new era of medical self-testing
description: Beyond smartwatches and rings, artificial intelligence is being used to make self-testing for major diseases more readily available – from headsets that detect early signs of Alzheimer's to an iris-scanning app that helps spot cancer.
content:

title: How Artificial Intelligence Is Shaping the Future of Language Learning and Global Careers
description: AI is revolutionising language learning by personalising education, enhancing accessibility, and bridging academic knowledge with real-world application.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming the way people learn, work, and communicate across borders. Among the many sectors influenced by AI, language learning stands out as one of the most visibly reshaped fields. As careers become increasingly ... [4117 chars]

title: Tech Layoffs in 2025 aren't about robots: Oxford Economics
description: Tech layoffs in 2025 are being widely blamed on artificial intelligence, but new research from Oxford Economics tells a different story. The report finds that economic pressures, not AI, remain the primary drivers of job cuts across the tech sector. As concerns over automation intensify, the evidence suggests the real challenge lies in workforce adaptation rather than widespread job displacement.
content:
As mass layoffs swept through the tech sector in 2025, artificial intelligence quickly became the most convenient scapegoat. Headlines warned of machines replacing humans, and social media echoed fears of an AI-driven employment crisis.
But a new rep... [5060 chars]

title: China unveils first AI model to gauge weather's impact on stock market
description: BEIJING, Jan 13: China has revealed its first artificial intelligence (AI) model designed to analyze the impact of weather patterns on financial markets, marking a novel step in climate-aware risk management, the China Meteorological Administration (CMA) has said. The model Shangji, or Stock, was jointly developed by the Shanghai-based Fudan University and the National Meteorological Information Centre. Its core function is to assess how meteorological factors influence asset pricing, offering a new tool for investment decisions and financial risk assessment, […]

title: Pentagon is embracing Musk's Grok AI chatbot as it draws global outcry
description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said Monday that Elon Musk's artificial intelligence chatbot Grok will join Google's generative AI engine in operating inside the Pentagon network, as part of a broader push to feed as much of the military's data as possible into the developing technology.
